PSCT.Vegas:
① Target 1 "Bujin" monster on the field; 
this turn, each time it destroys a monster by battle, 
whose current ATK is greater than or equal to that target's original ATK, and sends it to the GY: 
Banish the destroyed monster, and if you do, 
banish all monsters from your opponent's hand/Main/Exta/Gy with the same name that monster had in the GY.
